Variables.|0⟩, |1⟩: Basis states of the computational system

Properties.Measurement_Collapse: Observation forces state to single basis value

Properties.Non_Locality: Measurement of one qubit instantly determines other

Properties.Interference_Learning: Quantum phases create constructive/destructive learning patterns

Variables.QBC(t): Quantum biological computation state at time t
Variables.ψi(t): Quantum state of computational element i
Variables.Bi(t): Biological state function of element i

Properties.Self_Replication: QBC can reproduce its computational structure
Properties.Adaptive_Evolution: System modifies its structure based on computational results

Variables.DNA_Q(s): DNA-based quantum computation on sequence s
Variables.M(si): Measurement operator for DNA base si

Quantum_Consciousness.Formula: C(t) = ∫[QNN(s) × ψ(s) × E(s)]ds from 0 to t

Variables.C(t): Quantum consciousness function at time t
Variables.QNN(s): Quantum neural network state at time s

Properties.Self_Reference: System can model and modify its own quantum states
Properties.Non_Algorithmic: Some operations cannot be reduced to classical algorithms

Variables.Q(t): Quantum learning state at time t

Properties.Coherent_Learning: System maintains quantum coherence during learning
Properties.Non_Markovian: System retains memory of previous quantum states

Variables.P(λc): Phase transition at critical parameter λc

Properties.Critical_Learning: Maximum learning rate at phase transition points
Properties.Computational_Complexity: Phase transitions mark computational capacity shifts
Properties.Emergent_Capabilities: New computational abilities emerge at transitions

Properties.Information_Flow: Quantum information moves through biological substrate
Properties.Non_Classical_Transport: Tunneling enables information transfer through barriers
